questions.question: Tell me about yourself.
questions.answer: This is where you summarize your background, skills, and motivation briefly.

questions.question: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
questions.answer: Highlight key strengths relevant to the role and mention a weakness you're working to improve.

questions.question: Why do you want to work here?
